TopicTitle: GIF gallery of all the many cool KSA Flight Tracker features in action, and looking for ideas on what to add

Articles.Content:
the Kerbal Space Agency is currently on hiatus until things settle down post v1.1 so I've been focusing attention on the Flight Tracker which, since I don't care much for livestreaming, is my way of exposing the actions and history of the KSA to anyone who wants to follow along. More details on exactly how the Flight Tracker operates can be read here.

Why do I operate on Earth time? Same reason pretty much all the aliens in Sci-Fi TV shows speak English.

Now see what features I already have planned.

And finally, let me know if there's anything you can think of that would be good to have exposed via the Flight Tracker. Thanks!

Edited March 30, 2016 by Gaiiden
